infinitygauntlet.warning.playeroffline: The stored player is offline. They will spawn at the targeted location when they log in

infinitygauntlet.warning.realitythreadss: All of the reality threads have stopped

infinitygauntlet.error.nbtentity: Entity type not found in NBT list
